ibelgaufts.sungka

Class SungkaState

  • java.lang.Object
    • ibelgaufts.sungka.SungkaState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Game

    public class SungkaState
extends java.lang.Object
implements Game
    Contains the state of the sungka board. Ideally this would be used by the GUI but the animation requires updating the UI every time the board is changed. This class does not store intermediate states and so cannot be used. This class is instead used by the AI to simulate games.

    Cups on the board are indexed as follows: 
       |14|13|12|11|10| 9| 8|
 15|--------------------| 7
   | 0| 1| 2| 3| 4| 5| 6|
